pr_title: Migrate SysOperationsLogTableInfo, SysSummitsTableInfo and SysSnapshotsTableInfo to SystemTable

timeline.bodyText: The SystemTable defaults to routing on a single node, so you need to add an override.
timeline.author: mfussenegger

timeline.bodyText: This custom routing behavior needs to be preserved.
timeline.author: mfussenegger

timeline.bodyText:
I think we should extend the SystemTable getRouting method and add the routingProvider argument.
The routingProvider is initialized once per plan/query with the same seed, so that we have a stable routing result within one query.
May not matter much for system tables, but I think otherwise the difference in behavior could be confusing.
timeline.author: mfussenegger

replies.bodyText: Sounds good, i will do a separate pr for this.
replies.author: mkleen

replies.bodyText: I think it should be part of this PR, as otherwise this PR introduces a behavior change and is no longer just a internal refactoring.
replies.author: mfussenegger

timeline.bodyText:
I'm wondering if we should remove this overload and force all users of SystemTable to use the other variant.
By keeping this, we have another indirection, due to the (node, routingProvider) -> getRouting.apply(node).
timeline.author: mfussenegger

replies.bodyText: I am also not a big fan of overloading in general, i would say let's remove the Function<DiscoveryNodes, Routing> variant.
replies.author: mkleen
